subnarratives.subnarrative_name: CC: Amplifying Climate Fears: Amplifying existing fears of global warming
subnarratives.evidence_quote: As temperaturas mais elevadas levarão a mais mortes relacionadas com o calor, reduzirão a produtividade e resultarão num menor rendimento das culturas, no aumento da migração e na propagação de doenças infecciosas.
subnarratives.reasoning: The text outlines concrete negative consequences of higher temperatures (more heat-related deaths, reduced productivity, lower crop yields, increased migration, spread of diseases), which aligns with amplifying fears about global warming by detailing adverse impacts and associated risks.
